name: Visibly Connected
description:
Visibly Connected is an online marketing firm that specializes in Social Media Marketing.  Our social media services include consulting, workshops, and complete management.
Our philosophy is that Social Media is "Social" meaning it is not "sales".   The number one reason people are on social media is to stay connected to friends and family.
Our management services include profiles with - Facebook Business Page, Twitter, Blog, LinkedIn, and Pinterest.
